data.message: Facebook, Why won't you remove the fake Carnival cruise pages?? I have reported them and nothing has been done!!!

replies.message: Hey Nick. Due to the volume of reports we receive, we're unable to reply to every report. Rest assured that we are reading every inquiry we receive. Thank you for taking the time to improve the site. If you've reported something for violating the Facebook Terms, you may have the option to check the status of your report from the Support Dashboard: https://www.facebook.com/help/338745752851127 -Hailey
Hailey, thanks for your response. I do get responses back saying that the page doesn't violate community standards. The page is a scam which does violate standards.
